topics.body:
News:
Hillary is calling for all eligible voters to automatically be eligible for voting.


Basically rather than registering to vote you would automatically be registered and just need to show up with a usa ID of some sort.  It actually probably will happen in the long run because the democrats would profit greatly cause when she becomes president it would effectively shut out republicans from florida and ohio.


Tl:dr; in a couple years usa citizens will automatically be registered as voters cause it will benefit democrats voting wise.
